column1: Growing period: 10 days seedlings preparation + 21 days growing in the hydroponics system

column2: In current setup it is not possible to become profitable with usual retail price of lettuce. One lettuce has to be sold for at least 48CZK / 2,23USD.
Main articles are: electricity consumption, and labour. Reduction in these articles could bring positive result.
It was not inteded to create positive economical outcome with the first hydroponic system.
Hydroponic system brings also other values than just money.
Very likely it is possible to sell the product for higher price than usual retail price of conventional agriculture product.
It would be a great success to manage to reduce production costs to end up on even result (no profit, and no loss).

column1: If we had more space available we could grow twice as many lettuces with only slight increment of the investment cost (larger box), same amount of lights, etc.
Find below a study for double sized box:

column2: In current setup it is not possible to become profitable with usual retail price of lettuce. One lettuce has to be sold for at least 35CZK / 1,63USD.
Optimization of cost of labour, substrate, fertilizer, and utilization of daylight appear to be a way to find a profitable model.
Shortening the period of having lettuce in the system also appears to be a way to rech even or positive result.
Another way to go might be to chose a different crop to grow.
